Text.Page:
The festival hall is full of the spookiest, scariest decorations in all of Arun! You'll be in the thick of it guarding our cache of candy.

Can you handle the fright? Are you scared yet?"Ready!"
Whether you're scared or not, the Halloween event is about to begin. Are you ready?<TEXTBUTTON>"Are you kidding me?"</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>"Ready!"</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
